mdRecord.dcterms:title: An Old Scrapbook
mdRecord.dcterms:description: An old scrapbook of unknown history or provenance. There are references to names such as John Poff and Edsel Grace. The contents are an eclectic collection of newspaper clippings about obituaries, weddings, and other life events.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Scrapbooks
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
